text: In some cases, such as Neurovault, the dataset files may be updated. This is not handled by the current system. It would also have been useful when changing the affine of Miyawaki 2008 to trigger the download of the new dataset.
title: Dataset downloading: handle dataset version
clean_text: In case neurovault dataset file may updat thi handl current system It would also use chang affin miyawaki 2008 trigger download new dataset
